headline: Will Broadridge’s (BR) Digital Upgrades Deepen Its Competitive Edge in Wealth Management Technology?
summary: In the past week, Broadridge announced upgraded advisor marketing solutions, including a partnership with Wix for website creation and scalable video tools, while Wedbush Securities selected Broadridge as its core technology provider and Nitrogen revealed a new data integration with Broadridge's Wealth Aggregation and Insights platform.
